name: Asylum of Mysteries
description:
This was a one person project where the main goal was to craft a small area of a map as a small interactive area where the player can explore and talk to the NPCs. With the help of Pixel Crushers' Dialogue System, the small interactive area was made. Another goal of this project was to craft a story where there player gets to infer what the clues and ending can be rather than telling the player outright. This was achieved by making the writing give hints and leave off certain details so that players can feel free to think about what each aspect means. 

Developer's Commentary:

Controls:

Mouse - Move Camera

AWSD - Move Character

Tab - Quest Log
